Room.Name: Giant Redwood
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing under the largest redwood tree in the forest.
Room.LongDescription: A spiral staircase winds around the massive trunk of the tree, but stops about ten meters above the ground. High overhead, you see a wooden landing midway up, but from there the stairway disappears into the clouds. A sign at the bottom says: "This is the home of Trantori, the High Invoker. Visitors are not welcome, unless they wish to be turned into toads. If so, please come up." . ************************************************************
